datasetVersion.specialPermissions: Permission must be granted before access to recordings, transcripts and translations is made possible. Permission can be requested from Dr. David Beck (dbeck@ualberta.ca) or by clicking on the request permission link beside the file download button.

fields.value: Songs – L.L.- hunting spirit songs; M.L. – Love Song; L.L. – song from British Columbia (answering M.L.); H.D. – a Snohomish warriors’ song; H.D. maternal grandfather’s spirit song in Clallam.

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Contents:

Levi and Martha Lamont, Harriet Dover (Snohomish, Clallam, etc.) (8/22/63):

  • Songs – L.L.- hunting spirit songs
  • M.L. – Love Song
  • L.L. – song from British Columbia (answering M.L.)
  • H.D. – a Snohomish warriors’ song
  • H.D. maternal grandfather’s spirit song in Clallam.


From the Thom Hess Collection, Ethnomusicology Archives (UWEA 95-19.9) University of Washington, Seattle

datasetVersion.citation: Lamont, Levi; Lamont, Martha; Dover, Harriet, 2014, "Songs – L.L.- hunting spirit songs; M.L. – Love Song; L.L. – song from British Columbia (answering M.L.); H.D. – a Snohomish warriors’ song; H.D. maternal grandfather’s spirit song in Clallam.", https://doi.org/10.7939/DVN/10129, UAL Dataverse, V1
